Quote.Author: Catherine Deneuve
Quote.QuoteValue: All women who kill or have sexual obsessions or who are prostitutes have trouble with their fathers

Quote.Author: Catherine Deneuve
Quote.QuoteValue: A lot of actors don't like to see how they've done every day

Quote.Author: Catherine Deneuve
Quote.QuoteValue: It's very difficult for me to speak about being an actor

Quote.Author: Catherine Hardwicke
Quote.QuoteValue: When I read the 'Twilight' book, I didn't see it as fantasy. I saw it as a love story

Quote.Author: Catherine Hardwicke
Quote.QuoteValue: So many images are saying to girls, 'Show a lot of skin and look gorgeous and sexy.'

Quote.Author: Catherine Hardwicke
Quote.QuoteValue: People love to talk, so let them have fun talking

Quote.Author: Catherine Hardwicke
Quote.QuoteValue: There's so many versions of 'Red Riding Hood.' It goes back 700 years

Quote.Author: Catherine Hardwicke
Quote.QuoteValue: Nowadays, to get a movie greenlit, you have to make an incredible effort

Quote.Author: Catherine Hardwicke
Quote.QuoteValue: I try to learn on each project, try to really feel what the characters are feeling

Quote.Author: Catherine Hardwicke
Quote.QuoteValue: I think at any age, you can stay open and creative and excited

Quote.Author: Catherine Hardwicke
Quote.QuoteValue: For a film, when you condense, you don't want to keep going back to the same setting over and over

Quote.Author: Catherine Hardwicke
Quote.QuoteValue: We can learn from everybody

Quote.Author: Catherine Hardwicke
Quote.QuoteValue: You don't watch 'A Beautiful Mind' and say, 'This is how every mathematician is.'

Quote.Author: Catherine Tate
Quote.QuoteValue: Nothing prompts creativity like poverty, a feeling of hopelessness, and a bit of panic

Quote.Author: Catherine Tate
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't like tea! Never have, never drunk it

Quote.Author: Catherine Tate
Quote.QuoteValue: I've realised I need a gnawing, nagging, anxious doubt when I wake at 4 A.M

Quote.Author: Catherine Tate
Quote.QuoteValue: Few things focus the mind like fear

Quote.Author: Catherine Tate
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not frightened of a bit of silence

Quote.Author: Catherine Tate
Quote.QuoteValue: Although I was a shy child, I was also a bit flamboyant

Quote.Author: Catherine Tate
Quote.QuoteValue: That's the poisoned chalice: when you're shy, people assume you're arrogant

Quote.Author: Catherine Tate
Quote.QuoteValue: I was not a 'Doctor Who' fan. As a kid, I thought it was scary and for boys

Quote.Author: Catherine Tate
Quote.QuoteValue: At my core, the glass isn't half-empty - it's not even what I ordered in the first place

Quote.Author: Catherine Tate
Quote.QuoteValue: No one got anywhere by being too scared to open their mouth in case nobody laughed

Quote.Author: Chad Hurley
Quote.QuoteValue: Video is the most interesting and engaging way to share an idea with others

Quote.Author: Chad Hurley
Quote.QuoteValue: As long as I can remember, I was drawing or trying to create something

Quote.Author: Chad Hurley
Quote.QuoteValue: Google has a great product. They've built a great business

Quote.Author: Chad Hurley
Quote.QuoteValue: YouTube is committed to balancing the needs of the fan community with those of copyright holders

Quote.Author: Chad Hurley
Quote.QuoteValue: Video is universal and allows people around the world to communicate and exchange ideas

Quote.Author: Chad Hurley
Quote.QuoteValue: Video gives people a voice

Quote.Author: Chad Hurley
Quote.QuoteValue: There's always going to be a place for YouTube

Quote.Author: Chad Hurley
Quote.QuoteValue: Whenever you're the leader in any industry, you get more headlines

Quote.Author: Chad Hurley
Quote.QuoteValue: Content begets content

Quote.Author: Chad Hurley
Quote.QuoteValue: Everyone wants to be recognized

Quote.Author: Chad Kelly
Quote.QuoteValue: I've been through a lot; that I have

Quote.Author: Chad Kelly
Quote.QuoteValue: I dream big. I think big. I try to go out and do it as big as I can

Quote.Author: Chad Kelly
Quote.QuoteValue: People have sacrificed more to make me be happy than I could ever dream of

Quote.Author: Chad Kelly
Quote.QuoteValue: I feel as if we have the best team in the country. You've got to have that feeling

Quote.Author: Chad Kelly
Quote.QuoteValue: In order to get to where I want to be, I have to do the right things off the field, first

Quote.Author: Chad Kelly
Quote.QuoteValue: Everybody's watching when you're the quarterback. The other players see how much you want it

Quote.Author: Chad Kelly
Quote.QuoteValue: You just have to keep coming to work in order to be the best

Quote.Author: Chad Kelly
Quote.QuoteValue: If you're the quarterback and want to be the best on the field, you've got to act like it

Quote.Author: Chad Kelly
Quote.QuoteValue: Everything happens for a reason. But I would love to still be at Clemson

Quote.Author: Chaka Khan
Quote.QuoteValue: Walking through this life really is walking through fire

Quote.Author: Chaka Khan
Quote.QuoteValue: If I love a song, I make it mine

Quote.Author: Chaka Khan
Quote.QuoteValue: You know, it's just tough to get together and do work with somebody

Quote.Author: Chaka Khan
Quote.QuoteValue: I think the whole reason for my life is in there somewhere

Quote.Author: Chaka Khan
Quote.QuoteValue: Getting a degree, being on Sesame Street... those were like real accomplishments to me

Quote.Author: Chaka Khan
Quote.QuoteValue: Well. I'm probably not loving myself like I should, but I'm really trying

Quote.Author: Chaka Khan
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always struggled so much just to appreciate myself

Quote.Author: Chaka Khan
Quote.QuoteValue: To me, this degree was an acknowledgment of my work in music

Quote.Author: Chaka Khan
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd like to work on putting art programs back in schools

Quote.Author: Chaka Khan
Quote.QuoteValue: I love to sing. It's the easiest thing for me to do

Quote.Author: Charles Dance
Quote.QuoteValue: You have to be selfish to be an actor

Quote.Author: Charles Dance
Quote.QuoteValue: Politics is the most corrupt profession on Earth, no matter where you are

Quote.Author: Charles Dance
Quote.QuoteValue: We had five goats, two dogs, a cat and racks of commentaries on Shakespeare

Quote.Author: Charles Dance
Quote.QuoteValue: When you get to a certain age, the work begins to thin out

Quote.Author: Charles Dance
Quote.QuoteValue: Most films are written and made with a hero around 35, or even 25

Quote.Author: Charles Dance
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm playing one of the principal roles, which gives you more clout and more confidence

Quote.Author: Charles Dance
Quote.QuoteValue: I phoned this number and said, Please, sir, I want to be an actor

Quote.Author: Charles Dance
Quote.QuoteValue: You have to attempt to be objective about yourself

Quote.Author: Charles Dance
Quote.QuoteValue: I've got a range as an actor! There was a time I played dramatic leading men

Quote.Author: Charles Dance
Quote.QuoteValue: Power is always a corrupting influence

Quote.Author: Charley Pride
Quote.QuoteValue: Once your name becomes well known, politicians come courting

Quote.Author: Charley Pride
Quote.QuoteValue: I was always a dreamer, in childhood especially. People thought I was a little strange

Quote.Author: Charley Pride
Quote.QuoteValue: I grew up not liking my father very much. I never saw him cry. But he must have. Everybody cries

Quote.Author: Charley Pride
Quote.QuoteValue: Performing is an experience, for me, that is as humbling as it is energizing

Quote.Author: Charley Pride
Quote.QuoteValue: Fans will praise you, scold you, and offer helpful advice. Fans will also defend you

Quote.Author: Charley Pride
Quote.QuoteValue: A black man singing about a blond girl was potential trouble

Quote.Author: Charley Pride
Quote.QuoteValue: Chet Atkins... is probably the best guitar player who ever lived

Quote.Author: Charley Pride
Quote.QuoteValue: There is an intimacy about the Opry Theater that gives an entertainer a special charge

Quote.Author: Charley Pride
Quote.QuoteValue: Too many religious organizations are in the business of enforcing beliefs

Quote.Author: Charley Pride
Quote.QuoteValue: There are worse things than being thought a Republican

Quote.Author: Charlie Cox
Quote.QuoteValue: I am incredibly self-deprecating. It stems from self-doubt

Quote.Author: Charlie Cox
Quote.QuoteValue: I think the danger is to try and please everyone

Quote.Author: Charlie Cox
Quote.QuoteValue: Of all the London theatres, the Donmar is the dream

Quote.Author: Charlie Cox
Quote.QuoteValue: Claire Danes is lovely and a really great actress

Quote.Author: Charlie Cox
Quote.QuoteValue: My reaction when I hear the word 'celebrity' is, 'Who, me?' It doesn't feel like I'm famous

Quote.Author: Charlie Cox
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd love to play Spiderman, but I'm definitely too old for that role now

Quote.Author: Charlie Cox
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm grateful I know what it's like to be unemployed for long periods of time

Quote.Author: Charlie Cox
Quote.QuoteValue: If you want to play a complex, turmoiled character, then give him a dose of Catholicism

Quote.Author: Charlie Cox
Quote.QuoteValue: I love to do cardio. I like to run and sweat a lot, and I think that's quite helpful

Quote.Author: Charlie Cox
Quote.QuoteValue: I didn't grow up on comics, and I read very few

Quote.Author: Charlie Haden
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't be at your full creative power if you are sedated

Quote.Author: Charlie Haden
Quote.QuoteValue: I just see myself as a human being that's concerned about life

Quote.Author: Charlie Haden
Quote.QuoteValue: I can write a song about my hero Che Guevara and call it 'Song for Che.'

Quote.Author: Charlie Haden
Quote.QuoteValue: People ask me how could I go from country to jazz. It's been a natural convergence for me

Quote.Author: Charlie Haden
Quote.QuoteValue: Some tracks are with quartet and some tracks are with synthesizer

Quote.Author: Charlie Haden
Quote.QuoteValue: I just sit down at the piano and rattle it off

Quote.Author: Charlie Haden
Quote.QuoteValue: I grew up around guitar players

Quote.Author: Charlie Haden
Quote.QuoteValue: Mostly I play with records. I play with my friend Bill Evans

Quote.Author: Charlie Haden
Quote.QuoteValue: Bluegrass is in my blood and in my ears

Quote.Author: Charlie Haden
Quote.QuoteValue: I didn't play a lot of bass as a kid, but I sang it

Quote.Author: Charlie Hunnam
Quote.QuoteValue: It's generally more fun playing the villain

Quote.Author: Charlie Hunnam
Quote.QuoteValue: No, I do a bunch of things to entertain myself. I paint, I make music, I take photographs

Quote.Author: Charlie Hunnam
Quote.QuoteValue: English people are always surprised I'm English

Quote.Author: Charlie Hunnam
Quote.QuoteValue: If I have a long period of time away from acting, I tend to write

Quote.Author: Charlie Hunnam
Quote.QuoteValue: I love hip hop music, I make hip hop music

Quote.Author: Charlie Hunnam
Quote.QuoteValue: In a work capacity I'm only interested in acting and producing

Quote.Author: Charlie Hunnam
Quote.QuoteValue: I bought a house, and I've been decorating it

Quote.Author: Charlie Hunnam
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm reading scripts, desperately wanting to work. I've set a couple of things up for next year

Quote.Author: Charlie Hunnam
Quote.QuoteValue: The truth of the matter is the real industry is in LA and the cream of the talent is there

Quote.Author: Charlie Hunnam
Quote.QuoteValue: And I just want to work with good directors and good people

Quote.Author: Charlie Kaufman
Quote.QuoteValue: I was trying to figure out what a memory feels like

Quote.Author: Charlie Kaufman
Quote.QuoteValue: You are what you love. Not what loves you

Quote.Author: Charlie Kaufman
Quote.QuoteValue: I feel like I want to keep moving toward idiosyncracy. Personal, personal, personal

Quote.Author: Charlie Kaufman
Quote.QuoteValue: I like titles that are a little difficult, because it's kind of counterintuitive

Quote.Author: Charlie Kaufman
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not into extreme sports or something. I just live a quiet life

Quote.Author: Charlie Kaufman
Quote.QuoteValue: I do like escapism. I like going to the movies on a Friday night and seeing something fun

Quote.Author: Charlie Kaufman
Quote.QuoteValue: Constantly talking isn't necessarily communicating

Quote.Author: Charlie Kaufman
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes I don't like the books that I'm reading

Quote.Author: Charlie Kaufman
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm in my mind a lot. I live there

Quote.Author: Charlie Kaufman
Quote.QuoteValue: I do have, at different times, a certain kind of self-consciousness in the world, an insecurity

Quote.Author: Charlie Rose
Quote.QuoteValue: The question is just as important as the answer

Quote.Author: Charlie Rose
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm an only child, so I don't even have nieces or nephews

Quote.Author: Charlie Rose
Quote.QuoteValue: Richard Serra, the great sculptor, personifies an artist for me

Quote.Author: Charlie Rose
Quote.QuoteValue: The great regret of my life is that I didn't have children

Quote.Author: Charlie Rose
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to challenge people to find out who they are

Quote.Author: Charlie Rose
Quote.QuoteValue: I think the long interview has an important life

Quote.Author: Charlie Rose
Quote.QuoteValue: The person I've always wanted to interview but never met was Richard Burton

Quote.Author: Charlie Rose
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't talk about my politics. I am registered as an independent

Quote.Author: Charlie Rose
Quote.QuoteValue: My parents had a great work ethic

Quote.Author: Charlie Rose
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm flattered by the fact that most people tell me they don't know what my politics are

Quote.Author: Charlie Trotter
Quote.QuoteValue: When I graduated I wasn't sure what I wanted to do, but I knew I didn't want a conventional career

Quote.Author: Charlie Trotter
Quote.QuoteValue: I have always considered desserts to be of equal importance to the savory food

Quote.Author: Charlie Trotter
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe in focusing on details

Quote.Author: Charlie Trotter
Quote.QuoteValue: One must know combinations, one must have a true knowledge of food to be in the moment

Quote.Author: Charlie Trotter
Quote.QuoteValue: A quarter century of running a restaurant - that's a long time to do one thing

Quote.Author: Charlie Trotter
Quote.QuoteValue: My parents couldn't be looser. It was the ultimate laissez faire upbringing

Quote.Author: Charlie Trotter
Quote.QuoteValue: The idea that you have to pursue greatness... it's up to you; it's your life

Quote.Author: Charlie Trotter
Quote.QuoteValue: You've got to give away what you love

Quote.Author: Charlie Trotter
Quote.QuoteValue: Cooking is exactly like making music

Quote.Author: Charlie Trotter
Quote.QuoteValue: To me, searching for perfection isn't anywhere near as interesting as trying to find your own voice

Quote.Author: Charlotte Casiraghi
Quote.QuoteValue: Being a great horseman does not rely on physical strength but more on the mind and sensibility

Quote.Author: Charlotte Casiraghi
Quote.QuoteValue: I need both to feel good: the energy of the city and the quietness of the country

Quote.Author: Charlotte Casiraghi
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm never afraid of using bold colors or glitter or a stronger lipstick

Quote.Author: Charlotte Casiraghi
Quote.QuoteValue: I have no particular formula for staying private

Quote.Author: Charlotte Casiraghi
Quote.QuoteValue: Personally, fresh air and exercise help me stay healthy and make me feel great!

Quote.Author: Charlotte Casiraghi
Quote.QuoteValue: Eventing is way too dangerous. People get killed every year doing cross-country

Quote.Author: Charlotte Casiraghi
Quote.QuoteValue: I do not represent any product or any collection

Quote.Author: Charlotte Casiraghi
Quote.QuoteValue: When I ride, I always like to look neat

Quote.Author: Charlotte Casiraghi
Quote.QuoteValue: I am fortunate in having people around me who protect me

Quote.Author: Charlotte Casiraghi
Quote.QuoteValue: I started to ride when I was very young, and it's a sport I have practised for a very long time

Quote.Author: Charlotte Rampling
Quote.QuoteValue: If words don't have vibration behind them, and a real feeling behind them, then they're just words

Quote.Author: Charlotte Rampling
Quote.QuoteValue: I did that film just so I could kiss Robert Redford

Quote.Author: Charlotte Rampling
Quote.QuoteValue: I think what we do best, in the artistic world, are the things where we're handicapped

Quote.Author: Charlotte Rampling
Quote.QuoteValue: A film based on a jolly good John Grisham book is fine, but I like to get a bit under the skin

Quote.Author: Charlotte Rampling
Quote.QuoteValue: One mysterious person looking at another mysterious person equals what? Another mystery

Quote.Author: Charlotte Rampling
Quote.QuoteValue: You can never really judge your work because once it's done, it's done

Quote.Author: Charlotte Rampling
Quote.QuoteValue: Doing cinema is not about watching yourself

Quote.Author: Charlotte Rampling
Quote.QuoteValue: You cannot watch yourself dispassionately

Quote.Author: Charlotte Rampling
Quote.QuoteValue: I think that most actors don't have very good opinions of themselves

Quote.Author: Charlotte Rampling
Quote.QuoteValue: I could have carried on in comedy. But my life was dark

Quote.Author: Chelsea Cain
Quote.QuoteValue: There's not a lot of arc in an actual psychopath

Quote.Author: Chelsea Cain
Quote.QuoteValue: I grew up in Washington State and then eventually found my way back to Iowa City for grad school

Quote.Author: Chelsea Cain
Quote.QuoteValue: Often we don't even know what we think ourselves about people in our lives

Quote.Author: Chelsea Cain
Quote.QuoteValue: I read a lot of 'Nancy Drew' books as a kid and considered myself a bit of an amateur detective

Quote.Author: Chelsea Cain
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a sucker for a screwed-up protagonist. We all have issues

Quote.Author: Chelsea Cain
Quote.QuoteValue: Memory is a fiction we tell ourselves: just a piece of the truth

Quote.Author: Chelsea Cain
Quote.QuoteValue: I was obsessed with Val McDermid's Tony Hill and Carol Jordan books, delightfully twisted stuff

Quote.Author: Chelsea Cain
Quote.QuoteValue: I was born in Iowa City and spent my early childhood on a hippie commune just outside of town

Quote.Author: Chelsea Cain
Quote.QuoteValue: You won't make a living writing until you learn to write when you don't want to

Quote.Author: Chelsea Cain
Quote.QuoteValue: Of the paperbacks that you see at the airport, I am the most violent woman writer

Quote.Author: Cheryl Cole
Quote.QuoteValue: I didn't know what I was in for when I joined 'The X Factor' - I underestimated it

Quote.Author: Cheryl Cole
Quote.QuoteValue: Team spirit spurs me on. I've always found it easier to be strong for other people than for myself

Quote.Author: Cheryl Cole
Quote.QuoteValue: Sisterhood is important to me

Quote.Author: Cheryl Cole
Quote.QuoteValue: All I ever wanted was to perform, make music, make videos

Quote.Author: Cheryl Cole
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm from a big family. I've got 10 nieces and nephews

Quote.Author: Cheryl Cole
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't trust anybody in my life except my mother and my dogs

Quote.Author: Cheryl Cole
Quote.QuoteValue: I still am very street - I just have nicer clothes. I'm not ashamed of that

Quote.Author: Cheryl Cole
Quote.QuoteValue: I know that is what I was put on Earth to do - to be a mother

Quote.Author: Cheryl Cole
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not one of those people who holds a grudge about anything

Quote.Author: Cheryl Cole
Quote.QuoteValue: I just don't get boys; I don't really get men

Quote.Author: Chet Faker
Quote.QuoteValue: All my ego wants is to be sitting by a lake in Italy. It doesn't want to be backstage, warming up

Quote.Author: Chet Faker
Quote.QuoteValue: You can turn something into art just because of the way you tell people to look at it

Quote.Author: Chet Faker
Quote.QuoteValue: I love that way dance music can put you in a trance

Quote.Author: Chet Faker
Quote.QuoteValue: Learning to appreciate those things that aren't related to success has proved the biggest lesson

Quote.Author: Chet Faker
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a humanist at heart: at the end of the day, we are all human beings

Quote.Author: Chet Faker
Quote.QuoteValue: Hype is a good thing, but it can also be a bad thing if you aren't prepared to back it up

Quote.Author: Chet Faker
Quote.QuoteValue: I love performing. The more I do it, the more I grow into it

Quote.Author: Chet Faker
Quote.QuoteValue: My high school career counsellor said I shouldn't pursue music as a career

Quote.Author: Chet Faker
Quote.QuoteValue: I second guess everything I do musically, and I often could spend hours on, say, one snare sound

Quote.Author: Chet Faker
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd wear all APC if I could afford it and wasn't embarrassing to go head-to-toe in one brand

Quote.Author: China Mieville
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't like allegory

Quote.Author: China Mieville
Quote.QuoteValue: I think science fiction is very bad at prediction

Quote.Author: China Mieville
Quote.QuoteValue: Ever since I was two, I've loved octopuses, monsters, abandoned buildings

Quote.Author: China Mieville
Quote.QuoteValue: I love monsters

Quote.Author: China Mieville
Quote.QuoteValue: I love it when people want to interpret my books

Quote.Author: China Mieville
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a very friendly socialist

Quote.Author: China Mieville
Quote.QuoteValue: I like the idea of trying to write a book in every genre

Quote.Author: China Mieville
Quote.QuoteValue: I remember vividly what it's like to read as a 10-year-old - that passionate inhabiting of a book

Quote.Author: China Mieville
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a science fiction and fantasy geek

Quote.Author: China Mieville
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd never been to a science-fiction convention until I became a professional writer

Quote.Author: Chino Moreno
Quote.QuoteValue: When I see old friends, I'm very excited

Quote.Author: Chino Moreno
Quote.QuoteValue: Deja vu is one of the weirdest things that happens to me. It boggles my mind

Quote.Author: Chino Moreno
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't watch TV. In my spare time, if I have any, I want to make music

Quote.Author: Chino Moreno
Quote.QuoteValue: Anything I do with Team Sleep, I'd do with Deftones as well

Quote.Author: Chino Moreno
Quote.QuoteValue: The Butcherettes are led by a female singer, and they're sort of wild

Quote.Author: Chino Moreno
Quote.QuoteValue: For me, the best part of being in a band is playing shows, all the raw energy

Quote.Author: Chino Moreno
Quote.QuoteValue: I just happened to wind up in a metal band when I was 15

Quote.Author: Chino Moreno
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always had a deep passion for a lot of early electronic and sampled music

Quote.Author: Chino Moreno
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always tried to stay clear of being labeled, putting a label on what type of music that I make

Quote.Author: Chino Moreno
Quote.QuoteValue: I grew up listening to so much different pop and stuff other than just aggressive music

Quote.Author: Chitra Banerjee Divakaruni
Quote.QuoteValue: I like being myself. Maybe just slimmer, with a few less wrinkles

Quote.Author: Chitra Banerjee Divakaruni
Quote.QuoteValue: I took a little break after 'The Palace of Illusions' to clear my head

Quote.Author: Chitra Banerjee Divakaruni
Quote.QuoteValue: I want my books to force readers to recognise the fact that a woman is a human being just like them

Quote.Author: Chitra Banerjee Divakaruni
Quote.QuoteValue: I hate it when people throw away food - I've seen too many hungry people

Quote.Author: Chitra Banerjee Divakaruni
Quote.QuoteValue: To make money for college, I worked in our college dining room

Quote.Author: Chitra Banerjee Divakaruni
Quote.QuoteValue: With the strong women I write about, I want to create a sense of strong possibilities

Quote.Author: Chitra Banerjee Divakaruni
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm too careful with money - comes out of being poor for several years while growing up

Quote.Author: Chitra Banerjee Divakaruni
Quote.QuoteValue: To some extent, I draw on what I see around me; in other places, I imagine what I write

Quote.Author: Chitra Banerjee Divakaruni
Quote.QuoteValue: To me, characters are at the heart of great literature

Quote.Author: Chitra Banerjee Divakaruni
Quote.QuoteValue: I have no particular reader in mind, but a passionate desire to tell an honest, moving story

Quote.Author: Chloe Grace Moretz
Quote.QuoteValue: No matter how big you are in the business, at the end of the day it's still work

Quote.Author: Chloe Grace Moretz
Quote.QuoteValue: The best thing about having four big brothers is you always have someone to do something for you

Quote.Author: Chloe Grace Moretz
Quote.QuoteValue: There's someone to turn to

Quote.Author: Chloe Grace Moretz
Quote.QuoteValue: I did about 50 pull-ups and 1,000 crunches a day. Crazy

Quote.Author: Chloe Grace Moretz
Quote.QuoteValue: You go up for hundreds, thousands of roles, and you get told no, no, no, so many times

Quote.Author: Chloe Grace Moretz
Quote.QuoteValue: I love getting told no 'cause then I fight even more

Quote.Author: Chloe Grace Moretz
Quote.QuoteValue: Think about doing a bunch of stunts in leather. What does leather do? It doesn't stretch, it rips

Quote.Author: Chloe Grace Moretz
Quote.QuoteValue: If acting doesn't work out I'd love to produce, direct, or write

Quote.Author: Chloe Grace Moretz
Quote.QuoteValue: I was raised to think cursing makes you look unintelligent

Quote.Author: Chloe Grace Moretz
Quote.QuoteValue: I hope to make acting my career for the rest of my life, if I can

Quote.Author: Chloe Sevigny
Quote.QuoteValue: I think once you're past 30 you shouldn't wear a lot of glitter

Quote.Author: Chloe Sevigny
Quote.QuoteValue: I am most proud of my integrity and least proud of my cynicism

Quote.Author: Chloe Sevigny
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't like to read about myself, whether it be positive or negative

Quote.Author: Chloe Sevigny
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a sucker for packaging!

Quote.Author: Chloe Sevigny
Quote.QuoteValue: I know who I am by now. And I am my own brand

Quote.Author: Chloe Sevigny
Quote.QuoteValue: Even buying a swimsuit is super difficult. And then making one is even harder

Quote.Author: Chloe Sevigny
Quote.QuoteValue: I've been texting for a year with a couple of guys without ever going on a date with them

Quote.Author: Chloe Sevigny
Quote.QuoteValue: My room was a real way of expressing myself. It was like a little nest that I could settle into

Quote.Author: Chloe Sevigny
Quote.QuoteValue: Sadly, I haven't been doing a lot of kissing lately

Quote.Author: Chloe Sevigny
Quote.QuoteValue: The media loves negative spin

Quote.Author: Chris Colfer
Quote.QuoteValue: I could never rap, personally. I can't even wrap presents

Quote.Author: Chris Colfer
Quote.QuoteValue: I was a lone duck in a swan-filled pond who criticized everyone

Quote.Author: Chris Colfer
Quote.QuoteValue: Not taking yourself too seriously, that's the important thing

Quote.Author: Chris Colfer
Quote.QuoteValue: My life is an awkward visit from the kids table

Quote.Author: Chris Colfer
Quote.QuoteValue: I can sing and dance. I can smile - a lot

Quote.Author: Chris Colfer
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm really not good blackmail material

Quote.Author: Chris Colfer
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm horrible at auditions anyway. Maybe that's why I never got anything

Quote.Author: Chris Colfer
Quote.QuoteValue: I was made fun of a lot in high school because of the way I sound and the way I was

Quote.Author: Chris Colfer
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't personally feel a responsibility to be a role model, but as the actor, I do

Quote.Author: Chris Colfer
Quote.QuoteValue: I can act... I do a little writing as well. And I'm good at typing. I'm a creative typist, actually

Quote.Author: Chris Gibson
Quote.QuoteValue: If conservation isn't conservative, then words have no meaning at all

Quote.Author: Chris Gibson
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to drive down health care costs

Quote.Author: Chris Gibson
Quote.QuoteValue: The rural nature of our district relies heavily on the profitability of our family farms

Quote.Author: Chris Gibson
Quote.QuoteValue: When you talk about peace through strength, what you're talking about is the concept of deterrence

Quote.Author: Chris Gibson
Quote.QuoteValue: You can distill deterrence down to two factors: capability and will

Quote.Author: Chris Gibson
Quote.QuoteValue: We should roll back Common Core

Quote.Author: Chris Gibson
Quote.QuoteValue: Churches, synagogues, and mosques should be treated the same

Quote.Author: Chris Gibson
Quote.QuoteValue: Part of being conservative is judicious conservation of resources, both man-made and natural
